# [Aurora DSQL Adapter for Tortoise ORM v0.1.2 (python/tortoise-orm/v0.1.2)](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-orms/releases/tag/python/tortoise-orm/v0.1.2) - 2026-01-29

This release publishes license information to PyPI as part of the package metadata for better visibility.

## What's Changed
* Update changelog for 0.1.1 by [@github-actions](https://github.com/github-actions)[bot] in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#26](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/26)

* Add license classifier for PyPI by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#27](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/27)

# [Aurora DSQL Adapter for Tortoise ORM v0.1.0 (python/tortoise-orm/v0.1.0)](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-orms/releases/tag/python/tortoise-orm/v0.1.0) - 2026-01-29

Initial release of Aurora DSQL Adapter for Tortoise ORM.

## What's Changed
* Add gitleaks workflow by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#2](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/2)
* Add initial version by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#1](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/1)
* Define public API by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#5](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/5)
* Move aerich patching to dedicated module by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#4](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/4)
* Add workflow files by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#6](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/6)
* Bump actions/upload-artifact from 4 to 6 by [@dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot)[bot] in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#7](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/7)
* Bump actions/checkout from 4 to 6 by [@dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot)[bot] in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#8](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/8)
* Bump aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials from 4 to 5 by [@dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot)[bot] in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#9](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/9)
* Bump actions/download-artifact from 4 to 7 by [@dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot)[bot] in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#10](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/10)
* Bump astral-sh/setup-uv from 5 to 7 by [@dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot)[bot] in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#12](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/12)
* Add user documentation by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#3](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/3)

* Update dependencies by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#14](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/14)
* Allow multiple clusters to be created in parallel by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#15](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/15)
* Ensure modified third-party dependencies are attributed by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#16](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/16)
* Fix lexicographic migration version sorting by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#17](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/17)
* Update integration test cluster creation to match other repos by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#21](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/21)
* Remove DSQLModel mixin pending upstream fix by [@danielfrankcom](https://github.com/danielfrankcom) in [awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm#22](https://github.com/awslabs/aurora-dsql-tortoise-orm/pull/22)
